abstract: United States Defense Secretary Leon E Panetta casts doubt on talks aimed at persuading North Korea to abandon its nuclear program despite more positive public comments from negotiators for both countries.
snippet: United States Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said that he was unsure of what talks with North Korea would accomplish despite more positive public comments from negotiators earlier this week.

keywords.name: subject
keywords.value: United States Defense and Military Forces

lead_paragraph: United States Defense Secretary Leon E. Panetta said that he was unsure of what talks with North Korea would accomplish despite more positive public comments from negotiators earlier this week.

headline.main: North Korea Is Talking, but Panetta Is Skeptical
headline.print_headline: North Korea Is Talking, But Panetta Is Skeptical
headline.seo: Panetta Skeptical on Nuclear Talks With North Korea
